about_the_game:
Game Background:

After a plane crash, the passengers accidentally drift to a primitive tribe and begin a “start-from-scratch rural life.” With rich and exciting dialogues and vivid, lively characters, players can enjoy their tribal life with flavor. The mysterious primitive tribe, the dangerous and thrilling puzzle gameplay, what exactly is the secret of the altar?

  • Every day in this world, you need to carefully plan your time. Use your free moments to explore the map, learn about the primitive tribes in the deep mountain islands, enjoy the “fragrance of flowers” and the “chirping of birds” in nature, and activities like flower picking and fishing will add color to your life.

  • In addition, you will encounter a variety of marvelous creatures—strange people with pointy heads? A pig that plays the piano? And a cute but powerful little fox...

  • In this unforgettable accidental journey, dive into the local customs and actively participate in the tribe’s primitive activities to advance the main storyline and increase your game income. Unique and philosophically rich side quests, delightful mini-games, and special events will immerse you in the game.

Game Features:

  • Exciting yet rich mini-games

  • Carefully drawn 2D-style illustrations

  • Mysterious and rich exploration locations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: You are a freshly minted DieDieBrother, embarking on a whimsical, comedic, and absurd journey that challenges your mind, spirit, and even body. The game is guided by a writer who will "protect" you throughout the adventure, ensuring no grind,and no mental strain.
